clear_essay_sentences.text: Since the very foundation of Korean kingdom people needed means to protect themselves.
However, there is no doubt that Korean martial arts have become part of their routine.
It always has huge interest and many people now involved in Taekwondo.
But how to do first steps in this sport?
Giving you tips and tricks in picking up, in order to learn Taekwondo, you have to be patient because it's not as easy as you would imagine.
Firstly, try to repeat all of coach's movements which might help you to understand your body.
Secondly, be concentrated, so that you don't get injured.
Thirdly, don't forget about seniors they can help you with you beginning.
However, be aware of Korean mentality due to them being very polite and delicate.
Therefore, it may well be tough for you to cope with it.
I think that my advices will help you with this "adventure".
